Koga Shuko/Serpentor:


"Argh, he's a clone!  His original self was slaughtered by the Alliance." 
Koga Shuko said, not liking to repeat himself.

---

"The last thing I can remember is being captured by Zardus in a battle 
between Hell Beast, my ex-leader who didn't save me or try to, and the leader 
of the Alliance, Zardus.  Looking around he smiled.  "Why don't you go ask 
any of them!" he yelled, pointing to Hell Beast and his minions who had 
recently arrived on the battle scene.  Raising his launcher, he fired a 
powerful plasma blast off at the middle of Hell Beast and his group, yelling 
like a mad man.
